member.summary: Alters a table to make it system versioned (temporal).
member.param: An instance.
The table name.
The schema that contains the table, or null to use the default schema.
The history table name.
The name of the temporal start timestamp column.
The name of the temporal end timestamp column.

member.name: M:WUSTL.EMed.EntityFramework.SqlServer.Temporal.IDbMigrationExtensions.AlterTableRemoveTemporal(System.Data.Entity.Migrations.Infrastructure.IDbMigration,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Alters a table to remove system versioning (temporal).
member.param: An instance.
The table name.
The schema that contains the table, or null to use the default schema.
The history table name.
The name of the temporal start timestamp column.
The name of the temporal end timestamp column.
True if the history table should be dropped; otherwise, false.
True if the timestamp columns should be dropped; otherwise, false.
